format: A data frame with 100 observations on the following 13 variables.
reference: CDC's Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance System (YRBSS)
title: Sample of Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance System (YRBSS)
description:
Description
A sample of the yrbss dataset.

parameters.height: Height, in meters (3.28 feet per meter).
parameters.text_while_driving_30d:
How many days did you text while driving in
the last 30 days?
parameters.physically_active_7d:
How many days were you physically active for
60+ minutes in the last 7 days?
parameters.helmet_12m:
How often did you wear a helmet when biking in the last
12 months?
parameters.school_night_hours_sleep:
How many hours of sleep do you typically
get on a school night?
parameters.strength_training_7d:
How many days did you do strength training
(e.g. lift weights) in the last 7 days?
parameters.hours_tv_per_school_day:
How many hours of TV do you typically watch
on a school night?
parameters.weight: Weight, in kilograms (2.2 pounds per kilogram).
